Label: Study Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.STUDYID

Label: Unique Subject Identifier
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.USUBJID

Label: ADSL core variables are carried through all ADaM Datasets. See Core Variable column on the ADSL specs for variables kept on all ADaM datasets
Date of Death, Unfiltered
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: ADSL.DTHUNFDT

Label: Analysis Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: After sorting dataset by the KEYS, set to 1 for the first record per subject, then incremented by 1 for each subsequent record.

Label: Source Data
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to 'ADEFFINT'

Label: Source Variable
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Set to 'ADT'

Label: Source Sequence Number
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
Set to ASEQ from the record in ADEFFINT used to populate ADT.
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR', which is based on ADTTE.PARAMCD = 'PFSIVR', the values of SRCSEQ are carried forward from the PFSIVR record.

Label: Parameter (N)
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned as the numeric version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Parameter Code
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Parameter
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: Assigned as the decoded version of PARAMCD, as per the codelist

Label: Analysis Value
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
If PARAMCD in (PSARTTE) then AVAL=(ADTTE.ADT-ADTTE.STARTDT+1)/7
Otherwise AVAL=(ADTTE.ADT - ADTTE.STARTDT + 1)/30.4375
XL Comments: XW 2/14/2025: Time to PSA progression still use month, only PSA response use week.

Label: Time-to-Event Origin Date for Subject
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Analysis Date
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Censor
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Event or Censoring Description
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Censor Date Description
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: See VLM for assignments.

Label: Criterion 1 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If CRIT1 is non-missing, then set to 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 1
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR': if AVAL >= 3 then set to ">= 3 months".
Otherwise, null.

Label: Criterion 2 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If CRIT2 is non-missing, then set to 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 2
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR': if AVAL >= 6 then set to ">= 6 months".
Otherwise, null.

Label: Criterion 3 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If CRIT3 is non-missing, then set to 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 3
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR': if AVAL >= 12 then set to ">= 12 months".
Otherwise, null.

Label: Criterion 4 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If CRIT4 is non-missing, set to 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 4
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR': if AVAL >= 18 then set to ">= 18 months".
Otherwise, null.

Label: Criterion 5 Evaluation Result Flag
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor: If CRIT5 is non-missing, set to 'Y'.

Label: Analysis Criterion 5
Derivation / Comments / Predecessor:
For PARAMCD = 'DORIVR': if AVAL >= 24 then set to ">= 24 months".
Otherwise, null.
